text: (napiye! ‘‘Porukku alaittu) nir ennaic cotanaik kullakkamale (vittil nan tankiyirukka) enakku anumati taruviraka'' enru korupavarkalum avarkalil cilar irukkinranar. (Eninum ivvaru korum) avarkal (kastamana pala) cotanaikalileye mulkik kitakkavillaiya? Nirakarippavarkalai niccayamaka narakam culntu kontirukkiratu
